synopsis.text: Kurumi and her fellow Steel Angels are back in action, but this time, they're swapping their high-tech armor for more mundane challenges. Kurumi dives into the world of traditional Japanese customs, while Saki steps into the limelight as an actress. Meanwhile, Karinka finds herself on a blind date with Kamihito. Amidst all this, a fierce competition ignites among the Steel Angels, each vying for Nakahito's affection. Who will claim victory in this battle for Nakahito's heart? Only time will tell in these exciting and heartwarming OVAs of "Steel Angel Kurumi."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
